item.description: Housekeeping # We have a number of points to discuss at the start and end of a workshop. Starting a workshop # Welcome Who are we, and why are we here? (Introduce the RSE team, SA2C, why we choose to deliver training.) What are we doing? What is Software Carpentry? (Explain the topics that will be covered, and if this is a Carpentries workshop then explain our relationship with The Carpentries and how the material is collaboratively developed.

Timeline of training # The following steps are needed for a workshop. Months before a workshop # What workshops will be delivered in a semester are decided, as well as which will be in-person/online. These are communicated to the Postgraduate Office, who arrange for room bookings and registration pages. The workshop landing pages are created based on The Carpentries template. When registration pages are available, details are circulated to mailing lists.
